knimeNode.name: RDKit functional group filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node for filtering set of molecules using functional groups.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used for filtering sets of molecules based on named substructures (functional groups).
fullDescription.option: It specifies which column contains the set of RDKit molecules.
File containing functional group definitions. This input is optional. If not specified, then the default functional group definitions is used.
List of available functional group filters. Select the ones that needs to be applied. The qualifier and the count of functional group pattern also need to be specified.

ports.inPort: Table containing a set of RDkit molecules.
ports.outPort: Table containing molecules that pass the filter.
Table containing molecules that does not pass the filter.
